title: WTT: My Sov460 Devore for your Sovereign...TRADED

posts.post_title: WTT: My Sov460 Devore for your Sovereign...TRADED
posts.post_content:
I ended up with a couple of these, so looking to swap for another Sovereign I can use, in similar condition.  Let me know what you have to trade!  Looking for Sovereign T205s as well...

Take Care,
Geno
